items.headline: ASML bookings blow past estimates as SK Hynix plans capital-expenditure boost
items.summary_en: Rarely have two earnings reports so neatly aligned, as microchip equipment maker ASML Holding reported surprisingly strong orders growth as memory-chip producer SK Hynix said it would make a “considerable increase” in capital expenditure.

items.headline: Dollar tumbles to a four-year low as Trump claims it’s ‘doing great’
items.summary_en: The U.S. dollar fell to its lowest level in four years on Tuesday despite President Donald Trump claiming it was “doing great” in a speech in Iowa.
